title: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
tags: Quick toast with peanut butter and banana slices for a simple breakfast.
steps: Toast the bread until golden.
Spread peanut butter evenly over the warm toast.
Slice the banana and layer the slices on top.
Serve immediately.

title: Scrambled Eggs with Toast
tags: Fluffy scrambled eggs served with a slice of buttered toast.
steps: Crack the eggs into a bowl, add a splash of milk, and whisk.
Heat a pan over medium heat and melt a little butter.
Pour in the egg mixture and gently stir until soft and fluffy.
Toast the bread and butter it if desired.
Serve the eggs alongside the toast.

title: Apple Slices with Peanut Butter
tags: Classic snack of apple slices with peanut butter and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
steps: Wash and slice the apple into wedges.
Spread peanut butter on each slice or serve it on the side for dipping.
Sprinkle cinnamon lightly over the top.
Enjoy as a quick snack.

title: Carrot Sticks with Hummus
tags: Fresh carrot sticks dipped in creamy hummus for a healthy snack.
steps: Wash and peel the carrots.
Slice them into sticks.
Drizzle a tiny bit of olive oil over the hummus if desired.
Dip the carrot sticks into the hummus and serve.

title: Egg Salad Sandwich
tags: Simple egg salad spread on soft bread for an easy lunch.
steps: Boil the eggs until hard-cooked, then peel and chop them.
Mix chopped eggs with mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Spread the egg salad onto a slice of bread.
Top with another slice and serve.

title: Veggie Wrap
tags: A fresh veggie wrap filled with crisp vegetables and creamy hummus.
steps: Lay the tortilla flat on a plate.
Spread a generous layer of hummus over the tortilla.
Add chopped lettuce, sliced tomato, and sliced cucumber.
Roll the tortilla tightly into a wrap.
Slice in half and serve.

title: Rice and Beans Bowl
tags: A hearty bowl of rice and seasoned beans using pantry staples.
steps: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Sauté chopped onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add black beans and heat through.
Serve the beans over the rice.

title: Chicken and Veggie Skillet
tags: Quick chicken and vegetable skillet cooked with simple seasoning.
steps: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and cook the chicken until browned.
Add sliced carrots and broccoli and continue cooking until tender.
Season with salt and serve warm.

title: Pasta with Garlic Butter
tags: Simple pasta tossed in garlic butter for a comforting dinner.
steps: Cook the pasta in salted water until tender.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Drain the pasta and toss it in the garlic butter.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.
